params.amount: The amount of tokens being received
params.originAndNonce: Domain where the transfer originated and the        unique identifier for the message from origin to destination,        combined in a single field ((origin << 32) & nonce)
params.recipient: The address receiving the tokens; the original        recipient of the transfer
params.token: The address of the local token contract being received

params.toDomain: the domain of the chain the tokens are being sent to
params.toHook: True if sent to a hook, on the remote chain, false        otherwise
params.toId: the bytes32 address of the recipient of the tokens
params.token: the address of the token contract

params._custom: the address of the custom implementation to use.
params._domain: the domain of the canonical Token to enroll
params._id: the bytes32 ID of the canonical of the Token to enroll

params._domain: The domain of the remote xApp Router
params._router: The address of the remote xApp Router

params._nonce: The unique identifier for the message from origin to        destination

migrate(address).details: This is explicitly opt-in to allow dapps to decide when and how to      upgrade to the new representation.

params._oldRepr: The address of the old token to migrate

renounceOwnership().details: should be impossible to renounce ownership;      we override OpenZeppelin OwnableUpgradeable's      implementation of renounceOwnership to make it a no-op

params._extraData: Extra data that will be passed to the hook for        execution
params._remoteHook: The hook contract on the remote chain

params._xAppConnectionManager: The address of the xAppConnectionManager contract

Receive(uint64,address,address,address,u.notice: emitted when tokens are dispensed to an account on this domain         emitted both when fast liquidity is provided, and when the         transfer ultimately settles

Send(address,address,uint32,bytes32,uint.notice: emitted when tokens are sent from this domain to another domain

acceptProposedOwner().notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

delay().notice: Returns the delay period before a new owner can be accepted.

enrollCustom(uint32,bytes32,address).notice: Enroll a custom token. This allows projects to work with         governance to specify a custom representation.

enrollRemoteRouter(uint32,bytes32).notice: Register the address of a Router contract for the same xApp on a remote chain

migrate(address).notice: Migrate all tokens in a previous representation to the latest         custom representation. This works by looking up local mappings         and then burning old tokens and minting new tokens.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

proposeNewOwner(address).notice: Sets the timestamp for an owner to be proposed, and sets the newly proposed owner as step 1 in a 2-step process

proposed().notice: Returns the address of the proposed owner.

proposedTimestamp().notice: Returns the address of the proposed owner.

renounced().notice: Indicates if the ownership has been renounced() by checking if current owner is address(0)

send(address,uint256,uint32,bytes32,bool.notice: Send tokens to a recipient on a remote chain

sendToHook(address,uint256,uint32,bytes3.notice: Send tokens to a hook on the remote chain

setXAppConnectionManager(address).notice: Modify the contract the xApp uses to validate Replica contracts
